wikitext.*:
[[File:King Edward's School Chronicle.jpeg|thumb|225px|King Edward's School Chronicle]]
The '''''King Edward's School Chronicle''''' is a journal of [[King Edward's School]] which has been active since the 1840s.

A certain number of issues published in the 1910s contained works by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], when he was a pupil there. All past issues have been digitized and made available online by the School.

==November 1910==
Issue: vol. 25, no. 183.  [https://www.kingedwardvi-kes-archives.org/PDFViewer/web/viewer.html?file=%2fFilename.ashx%3ftableName%3dta_publications%26columnName%3dfilename%26recordId%3d269 Link to the issue]

Contains Tolkien's "Debating Society Report" (pp. 68–71).

==December 1910==
Issue: vol. 25, no. 184.  [https://www.kingedwardvi-kes-archives.org/PDFViewer/web/viewer.html?file=%2fFilename.ashx%3ftableName%3dta_publications%26columnName%3dfilename%26recordId%3d270 Link to the issue]

Contains Tolkien's "Debating Society Report" (pp. 94–95).

==February 1911==
Issue: vol. 26, no. 185.  [https://www.kingedwardvi-kes-archives.org/PDFViewer/web/viewer.html?file=%2fFilename.ashx%3ftableName%3dta_publications%26columnName%3dfilename%26recordId%3d272 Link to the issue]

Contains Tolkien's "Debating Society Report" (pp. 5–9).

==March 1911==
Issue: vol. 26, no. 186.  [https://www.kingedwardvi-kes-archives.org/PDFViewer/web/viewer.html?file=%2fFilename.ashx%3ftableName%3dta_publications%26columnName%3dfilename%26recordId%3d273 Link to the issue]

Contains Tolkien's poem "[[The Battle of the Eastern Field]]" (pp. 22–26) and "[[Acta Senatus]]" (a debate report in Latin; pp. 26–27).

==June 1911==
Issue: vol. 26, no. 187.  [https://www.kingedwardvi-kes-archives.org/PDFViewer/web/viewer.html?file=%2fFilename.ashx%3ftableName%3dta_publications%26columnName%3dfilename%26recordId%3d274 Link to the issue]

Contains Tolkien's "Editorial" (pp. 33–34) and the "Debating Society Report" (pp. 42–45). The issue was also edited by Tolkien himself.

==July 1911==
Issue: vol. 26, no. 188.  [https://www.kingedwardvi-kes-archives.org/PDFViewer/web/viewer.html?file=%2fFilename.ashx%3ftableName%3dta_publications%26columnName%3dfilename%26recordId%3d275 Link to the issue]

Contains Tolkien's "Editorial" (pp. 53–54). The issue was also edited by Tolkien himself.

==December 1913==
Issue: vol. 28, no. 202.  [https://www.kingedwardvi-kes-archives.org/PDFViewer/web/viewer.html?file=%2fFilename.ashx%3ftableName%3dta_publications%26columnName%3dfilename%26recordId%3d291 Link to the issue]

Contains "Oxford Letter" (pp. 80–81), a letter from Tolkien reporting the activities of former pupils of King Edward's School now at [[Oxford University]]. Though signed as "Oxon", Tolkien's authorship was revealed in his papers.<ref>{{CG|2III}}</ref>
